features: 【Face Tracking AND Intelligent Shooting】This face tracking phone holder adopts AI computing system that can automatically recognize and track your face or body, 360° rotate steadily with your movement. Free your hands for video calls and live streaming.

【No APP Required】With a built-in camera, the face tracking phone holder can track you intelligently, you don’t need to download any app. Compatible with all video apps like Facebook, Zoom, live streaming, photo & video shooting.

【360° Rotatable Phone Holder】 The adjustable 360°clamp rotation and 315°neck can choose horizontal or vertical camera mode, can be adjusted at multiple angles. 105°field of view angle of lens and 42°rotation speed per second ensure that the tracking tripod can track your movement, wherever you go, you’re the focus all the time.

【Standard 1/4" Interfacer】The smart tracking holder comes with a standard 1/4" screw thread at the bottom that can be mounted on a tripod and adjust the angle and height. The included phone holder expands 2-4" wide to securely fit any size cell phone.

【Built-in Rechargeable Battery】The smart tracking phone holder is equipped with a built-in rechargeable 2200mAh battery and USB charging port. After fully charged, it will last up to 6-8 hrs. The red charging indicator is on when charging, after the charging is completed, the red charging indicator goes out.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 360° Rotatable Phone Holder With 360°rotation, the auto tracking phone holder allows you to switch from portrait or landscape orientation when taking a picture. Wherever you you, fast follows. AI Tracking Auto recognizes and tracks your face or body as you move in front of the tracking tripod. Go fully hands free on video calls and live streaming. You can truly go hands free without any app restrictions. Standard 1/4" Interfacer It comes with a standard 1/4 inch interface, which can be mounted on a tripod and adjust the angle and height, you have the option to attach a phone holder, camera mount, or most lightweight cameras. Rechargeable Battery Built-in 2200 mAh rechargeable lithium battery, can work continuously for 6-8 hours after fully charged.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Hands Free
reviews.reviewText: This products works well on video calls when you are moving around. It follows you wherever you move

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item for price
reviews.reviewText: My son wanted one of these to video his bmx riding. He wanted a more expensive one but I opted for this one to make sure he will use before investing in a more expensive one. Well winner winner chicken dinner he loves this one and it works amazing so we def don’t need to get the other one!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the Price: Auto Face Tracking Tripod Review
reviews.reviewText: The Auto Face Tracking Tripod is a budget-friendly option for those looking for a phone camera mount that can rotate 360 degrees. I purchased this tripod in 2021 and have been using it for a few years now.Pros:-Inexpensive-No app required-360° rotation for versatile shooting options-Rechargeable batteryCons:-Auto face tracking is not always accurateOverall, this tripod is a good option for those on a budget. It is easy to set up and use, and the rechargeable battery is a convenient feature. However, I did find that the auto face tracking feature is not always accurate.In terms of value for money, this tripod is a good choice. It is relatively inexpensive compared to other options on the market and offers a range of features. However, if you are looking for a tripod with more advanced or accurate face tracking capabilities, it may be worth spending a bit more on a higher-end product.In conclusion, the Auto Face Tracking Tripod is a good budget-friendly option for those looking for a phone camera mount for vlogging or live streaming. It is not suitable for professional or high-quality video production, but for the price it is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mom wouldn't shut up about it
reviews.reviewText: My mother likes to record videos for her vlogging YouTube channel, and asked me to get this for her. It took a while for me to teach her how to use it, but she picked up on it eventually. It's easier for her to record now without having to manually move her phone camera.
